frontmatter.title: Lightning Talks - Day 1
frontmatter.description: Featuring Erin Fox: "Learning React Native as a junior engineer", Shawn Swyx Wang: "GraphQL and Babel: Blade", Christina Keelan Cottrell: "Conquering Lighthouse: Why the largest part of your app is images", and Autumn Crossan: "Unit Testing your React components without wanting to tear your hair out later"
